channel.title: Interview with Bob Stine
channel.description: Recording of Bob Stine, a WWII-era veteran from Freedom, WI, as interviewed by two middle-school students on May 30, 2025.
channel.itunes:author: Interview with Bob Stine Team
channel.itunes:summary: This 16:03 recording captures Bob Stine (age 87) in conversation with two 8th graders—Matthew Griesbach (14) and Elias Blaesing (15)—about his life and service.

item.title: Interview with Bob Stine
item.description: This StoryCorps interview was recorded May 30, 2025. Participants include two 8th graders—Matthew Griesbach (14) and Elias Blaesing (15)—interviewing Bob Stine (87, nearly 88), a veteran from Freedom, WI, about his life and experiences :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}.
